title: CorTalk: Rabconnectin in the Brain
description: Dr. Meenakshi Bhardwaj (Centre for Human Genetics, University of Oxford) presents her recent insights on the role of Rabconnectin-3a in lysosomal trafficking, nutrient sensing, v-ATPase activity and neurotransmitter release, as well as the pathophysiological implications of the protein in intellectual disability.
